item.description:
An intimate and relaxing evening of meditation. A Conduit Sound Healing Concert is an effective method for reducing stress and creating a deep sense of peace. Join others in experiencing group meditation through the vibrational sounds of gongs and tibetan bowls.
Watch a YouTube Video of this unique healing modality:
[center] <xobject width="425" height="344"><xembed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/pw1u6Hneo6M&hl=en&fs=1&" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" height="344" style="margin : 5px ; max-width : 700px ; max-height : 700px"></xembed></xobject>[/center]
[center]Suggested donation: $10 - 20 per person. All donations support the operations of the Growing Green Co-op's community center and healing arts space.[/center]
item.name: The Conduit: An Evening of Sound Healing Meditation
